headers.value: default-src 'none'; script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval' https://va.vercel-scripts.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https: wss:; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com data:; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'none';
